product_name: Aqua Sphere Kaiman Clear Lens Swim Goggles
long_description: When you're hitting the lanes, you'll appreciate the wide-view lenses of the Aqua Sphere Kaiman Clear Lens Swim Goggles. Scratch-resistant Plexisol(R) lenses help keep your vision clear with their antifog properties, and they offer 100% UVA and UVB protection. Hypoallergenic silicone gasket skirt creates a watertight seal and feels soft against skin. Lenses provide 180deg, distortion-free vision, and a high degree of scratch- and fog-resistance. Aqua Sphere Kaiman Clear Lens Swim Goggles secure the fit with a nonslip headstrap and easy-to-adjust, locking side buckles.
short_description: When you're hitting the lanes, you'll appreciate the wide-view lenses of the Aqua Sphere Kaiman Clear Lens Swim Goggles.
